summary: A romantic musical story having the vibes both France and USA.
cast: Sabine Azéma|Isabelle Nanty|Audrey Tautou|Pierre Arditi|Darry Cowl|Jalil Lespert|Daniel Prévost|Lambert Wilson|Bérangère Allaux|Françoise Gillard|Toinette Laquière|Gwenaëlle Simon|Nina Weissenberg|André Dussollier
title: En la boca, no
